query.sfwSql: select RA.*, p.last_name,p.first_name,p.middle_name,p.ssn ,m.last_name as RecipientLastName,m.first_name as RecipientFirstName, m.middle_name as RecipientMiddleName,m.ssn as RecipientSSN, m.person_id as RecipientPersonId ,o.org_code,o.org_name,pl.plan_name,pay.payee_account_id from sgt_benefit_application RA WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person p WITH(NOLOCK) on ra.member_person_id = p.person_id left outer join sgt_person m WITH(NOLOCK) on ra.recipient_person_id = m.person_id left outer join sgt_organization o WITH(NOLOCK) on o.org_id = RA.payee_org_id left outer join sgt_payee_account pay WITH(NOLOCK) on pay.payee_account_id = RA.originating_payee_account_id and pay.benefit_account_type_value = 'PSTD' inner join sgt_plan pl WITH(NOLOCK) on pl.plan_id = RA.plan_id order by 1 desc
select * from sgs_code_value WITH(NOLOCK) where code_id = 2216
Select * from sgt_Person_account WITH(NOLOCK) where person_id = @person_id and Plan_id = @plan_id and plan_participation_status_value in ('ENL1', 'SUS2')and end_date is null order by start_date desc
delete from sgt_benefit_application_error where benefit_application_id = @benefit_application_id
delete from SGT_BEN_APP_OTHER_DIS_BENEFIT where benefit_application_id = @benefit_application_id

SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PLAN_ID = PLN.PLAN_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'SUS2' AND CV.DATA1='RETR'
delete from sgt_benefit_application_person_account where benefit_application_id = @benefit_application_id WITH(NOLOCK)
Select * from sgs_code_value WITH(NOLOCK) where code_id=2216 and data2='RFND'

select * from sgw_bpm_activity_instance sai WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgw_bpm_activity sa WITH(NOLOCK) on sai.ACTIVITY_ID = sa.ACTIVITY_ID where sa.PROCESS_ID = @process_id and sai.reference_id = @reference_id and sai.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','PROC','RETU','REAU')

Select * from SGT_BENEFIT_REFUND_CALCULATION a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION b WITH(NOLOCK) on a.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID=b.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID where b.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=@benefiapplicationid
Select * from SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION where benefit_account_type_value='RFND' AND ACTION_STATUS_VALUE='DEFE' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, ACTION_STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE,getdate()) >= 5

SELECT C.PERSON_ID 'DecedentPERSLinkID', ISNULL(C.LAST_NAME,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(C.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(C.MIDDLE_NAME,'') 'DecedentName', C.DATE_OF_DEATH 'DateofDeath', E.PLAN_NAME 'Plan', CASE WHEN B.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID IS NOT NULL THEN (ISNULL(BENPERSON.LAST_NAME,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(BENPERSON.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(BENPERSON.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) WHEN BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID IS NOT NULL THEN BENORG.ORG_NAME ELSE (ISNULL(B.LAST_NAME,'') + ', ' + ISNULL(B.FIRST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(B.MIDDLE_NAME,'')) END 'BeneficiaryName', CASE WHEN B.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID IS NOT NULL THEN B.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID ELSE BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID END 'BeneficiaryPERSLinkID' FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_BENEFICIARY A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BENEFICIARY_ID=B.BENEFICIARY_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON C WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.PERSON_ID=C.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT D WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=D.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN E WITH(NOLOCK) ON E.PLAN_ID=D.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP.MEMBER_PERSON_ID=C.PERSON_ID AND APP.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE in ('DETH','PSTD') AND APP.RECIPIENT_PERSON_ID=B.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP1 .MEMBER_PERSON_ID=C.PERSON_ID AND APP1.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE in ('DETH','PSTD') AND APP1 .PAYEE_ORG_ID=B.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON APP2.MEMBER_PERSON_ID=B.beneficiary_PERSON_ID AND APP2.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE in ('RETR','DISA','RFND') LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON BENPERSON WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENPERSON.PERSON_ID=B.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION BENORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON BENORG.ORG_ID=B.BENIFICIARY_ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SC.CODE_VALUE=D.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AND SC.CODE_ID=D.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID=C.PERSON_ID AND SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE != 'RETR' AND C.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN SPA.BENEFIT_BEGIN_DATE AND ISNULL(SPA.BENEFIT_END_DATE,'12/31/9999') --PROD PIR ID 6329 WHERE EXISTS( --PROD PIR ID 6329 SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT_HISTORY HIS WITH(NOLOCK) ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SPA.PERSON_ID = C.PERSON_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('SUS2','ENL1') AND C.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') ) AND C.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN @DateofDeathFrom AND @DateofDeathTo AND C.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN A.START_DATE AND ISNULL(A.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') AND --PROD PIR ID 6329 E.RETIREMENT_TYPE_VALUE='DB' AND ISNULL(APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID,0) + ISNULL(APP1 .BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID,0) + ISNULL(APP2 .BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID,0)=0 AND SC.DATA2 NOT IN ('WTDN') ORDER BY C.DATE_OF_DEATH, C.PERSON_ID,E.PLAN_ID

SELECT SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID AS [PERSLink ID], SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,1,3)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,4,2)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,6,4) AS [SSN], SP.LAST_NAME AS [Last Name] , SP.FIRST_NAME AS [First Name], CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),SBA.RECEIVED_DATE,101) AS [Application Received Date ], CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),SBA.ACTION_STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE,101) AS [Application Approved Date], CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),SBA.PAYMENT_DATE,101) AS [Payment Date], SBA.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE AS [ActionStatus],SBA.STATUS_VALUE AS [Status] FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA, SGT_PERSON SP WHERE SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID AND SBA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RFND' AND SBA.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE IN ('DBCT','SPEL') AND SBA.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('DENI','CANC') ORDER BY SP.LAST_NAME,SP.FIRST_NAME,SP.SSN

IF @CHOICE = 'Y' BEGIN SELECT SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID AS [PERSLinkID], SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,1,3)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,4,2)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,6,4) AS [SSN], ISNULL(SP.LAST_NAME,'')+','+ISNULL(SP.FIRST_NAME,'') AS [LastName], SP.FIRST_NAME AS [FirstName], SBRC.PRE_TAX_EE_CONTRIBUTION_AMOUNT AS [EEPreTaxAmount], SBRC.POST_TAX_EE_CONTRIBUTION_AMOUNT AS [EEPostTaxAmount], SBRC.EE_ER_PICKUP_AMOUNT AS [EEEmpPickupAmount], SBRC.EE_INTEREST_AMOUNT AS [EEInterestAmount], SBRC.ER_PRE_TAX_AMOUNT AS [ERPreTaxAmount], SBRC.ER_INTEREST_AMOUNT AS [ERInterestAmount], NULL AS [TotalTransferAmount], NULL AS [PSC], CASE WHEN ISNULL(SBC.OVERRIDDEN_FINAL_AVERAGE_SALARY,0) > SBC.COMPUTED_FINAL_AVERAGE_SALARY THEN SBC.OVERRIDDEN_FINAL_AVERAGE_SALARY ELSE SBC.COMPUTED_FINAL_AVERAGE_SALARY END AS [CurrentFAS], SPA.START_DATE AS [PlanParticipationStartDate], (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_MISSED_DEPOSIT SPAMD WHERE SPAMD.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID)AS [NumberofMissedMonths], SPE.START_DATE AS [EmploymentStartDate], SPE.END_DATE AS [EmploymentEndDate], LTRIM(RTRIM(SO.ORG_CODE)) + ' - ' + SO.ORG_NAME AS [OrgCodeID_OrgName], SBRC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID, SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, @CHOICE AS INDICATOR FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION SBC ON SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_REFUND_CALCULATION SBRC ON SBC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID = SBRC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID AND SBA.PLAN_ID = SPA.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT SPE ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SPE.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO ON SPE.ORG_ID = SO.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.APPLICATION_ID = SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER PHH ON PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE (((SPA.START_DATE >= SPE.START_DATE AND SPA.START_DATE <= ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,SPA.START_DATE)) AND (ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,SPE.START_DATE) >= SPE.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,GETDATE())) <= ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,GETDATE()))) OR ((SPE.START_DATE >= SPA.START_DATE AND SPE.START_DATE <= ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,SPE.START_DATE)) AND (ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,SPA.START_DATE) >= SPA.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,GETDATE())) <= ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,GETDATE())))) AND SBA.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE IN ('DBDC','DBTT') AND SBA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RFND' AND PHH.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @PAYMENTSCHEDULEID AND ISNULL(PA.RHIC_EE_AMOUNT_REFUND_FLAG,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY SP.LAST_NAME,SP.FIRST_NAME,SP.SSN END ELSE BEGIN SELECT SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID AS [PERSLinkID], SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,1,3)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,4,2)+'-'+SUBSTRING(SP.SSN,6,4) AS [SSN], SP.LAST_NAME AS [LastName], SP.FIRST_NAME AS [FirstName], SBRC.PRE_TAX_EE_CONTRIBUTION_AMOUNT AS [EEPreTaxAmount], SBRC.POST_TAX_EE_CONTRIBUTION_AMOUNT AS [EEPostTaxAmount], SBRC.EE_ER_PICKUP_AMOUNT AS [EEEmpPickupAmount], SBRC.EE_INTEREST_AMOUNT AS [EEInterestAmount], SBRC.ER_PRE_TAX_AMOUNT AS [ERPreTaxAmount], SBRC.ER_INTEREST_AMOUNT AS [ERInterestAmount], NULL AS [TotalTransferAmount], SBRC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID, @CHOICE AS INDICATOR FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION SBC ON SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_REFUND_CALCULATION SBRC ON SBC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID = SBRC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.APPLICATION_ID = SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER PHH ON PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE SBA.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE = 'DTCT' AND SBA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RFND' AND PHH.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @PAYMENTSCHEDULEID AND ISNULL(PA.RHIC_EE_AMOUNT_REFUND_FLAG,'N') = 'N' ORDER BY SP.LAST_NAME,SP.FIRST_NAME,SP.SSN END

select pa.* from sgt_person_account pa inner join sgt_person per on pa.person_id = per.person_id INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.CODE_VALUE=pa.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AND CV.CODE_ID=337 inner join sgt_plan p on pa.plan_id = p.plan_id where ISNULL(RMD_BATCH_INITIATED_FLAG,'N')<> 'Y' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH,DATE_OF_BIRTH,@batchEndDate) >= 875 AND per.DATE_OF_DEATH IS NULL AND RETIREMENT_TYPE_VALUE='DB' AND CV.DATA2 IN ('ERLD','SPND') AND not exists(select 1 from sgt_person_employment_detail a inner join sgt_person_employment b on a.person_employment_id = b.person_employment_id where per.person_id = b.person_id and a.STATUS_VALUE IN ('CONT','LOA','LOAM', 'NCON') and a.end_date is null) AND not exists(select 1 from SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION app where pa.person_id = app.member_person_id and pa.plan_id = app.plan_id and BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA','RFND') AND STATUS_VALUE <> 'PROC' AND ACTION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('PEND','VERF'))

UPDATE BA SET status_value='PROC', MODIFIED_BY='PERSLink Batch'+' '+ convert(nvarchar,@batchscheduleid), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE(), UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 from sgt_benefit_Application BA inner join ( Select PA.Application_id from sgt_payee_Account PA inner join sgt_payment_history_header PHH on PA.payee_account_id=phh.payee_account_id and phh.payment_schedule_id=@paymentscheduleid where phh.payee_account_id is not null and pa.application_id is not null) As PBA on BA.benefit_Application_id =PBA.application_id WHERE ISNULL(ba.status_value,'') <> 'PROC'
UPDATE BA SET status_value='PROC', MODIFIED_BY='PERSLink Batch'+' '+ convert(nvarchar,@batchscheduleid), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE(), UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION BA INNER JOIN ( SELECT BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID FROM SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION WHERE ISNULL(ACTION_STATUS_VALUE,'') = 'APPR' AND ISNULL(STATUS_VALUE,'') <> 'PROC' AND (PLAN_ID = 7 OR PLAN_ID = 28 OR PLAN_ID = 30) ) CALC ON BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = CALC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE ISNULL(BA.STATUS_VALUE,'') <> 'PROC' AND (PLAN_ID = 7 OR PLAN_ID = 28 OR PLAN_ID = 30) AND BA.PAYMENT_DATE <= (SELECT PAYMENT_DATE FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @PAYMENTSCHEDULEID) -- ADDED

SELECT EMPACCDET.*, PERSON.*, ORG.*, DET.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERSONACC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERSONACC.PLAN_ID=PLN.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON CV.CODE_VALUE=PERSONACC.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE AND CV.CODE_ID=337 INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=EMP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID AND EMPDET.STATUS_VALUE IN ('CONT','LOA','LOAM', 'NCON') AND EMPDET.END_DATE IS NULL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPACCDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPACCDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID =EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID AND EMPACCDET.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE --(SELECT count(*) FROM sgt_person_account_employment_detail paed WITH(NOLOCK) -- inner join sgt_person_employment_detail EMPDUPDET WITH(NOLOCK) on EMPDUPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=PAED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID AND -- EMPDUPDET.STATUS_VALUE IN ('CONT','LOA','LOAM', 'NCON') -- and EMPDUPDET.END_DATE IS NULL -- and paed.person_account_id = personacc.person_account_id -- ) > 0 --and RETIREMENT_TYPE_VALUE='DB' AND CV.DATA2 IN ('ERLD','SPND') AND DATEDIFF(MONTH,DATE_OF_BIRTH,@BatchEndDate) >= 878 AND ISNULL(DB_BATCH_LETTER_SENT_FLAG,'N')<> 'Y' ) AS MAINTAB INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPACCDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPACCDET.PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID =MAINTAB.PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL DET WITH(NOLOCK) on EMPACCDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=DET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=DET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMP.ORG_ID=ORG.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PERSON WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERSON.PERSON_ID=EMP.PERSON_ID

SELECT DISTINCT PERSON.* ,SPA.*,SPADC.* FROM ( SELECT PER.PERSON_ID, PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP_PROVIDER DEFPROV WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DEFPROV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID And (ISNULL(PAYMENT_STATUS_VALUE,'') NOT IN ('RECV','CLOS') AND ISNULL(ASSETS_WITH_PROVIDER_VALUE,'') <> 'BENE') ),0) DEFCOUNT FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERSONACC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP DEFCOMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=DEFCOMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND ISNULL(DEF_COMP_MONTH_LETTER_FLAG,'') <> 'Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT EMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=EMP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL EMPDET WITH(NOLOCK) ON EMPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID=EMP.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_ID AND DATEDIFF(MONTH,DATE_OF_BIRTH,@BatchEnddate) >= 875 AND PERSONACC.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'WTN2' AND PERSONACC.PLAN_ID = 19 where (SELECT count(*) FROM sgt_person_account_employment_detail paed WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person_employment_detail EMPDUPDET on EMPDUPDET.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID=PAED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID AND EMPDUPDET.STATUS_VALUE IN ('CONT','LOA','LOAM', 'NCON') and EMPDUPDET.END_DATE IS NULL and paed.person_account_id = personacc.person_account_id ) = 0 ) AS MAINTAB INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PERSON WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERSON.PERSON_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ID AND PERSON.DATE_OF_DEATH IS NULL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP SPADC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPADC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE MAINTAB.DEFCOUNT >0

SELECT SP.*, SPA.*, SPADC.* FROM(SELECT PER.PERSON_ID, PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP_PROVIDER DEFPROV WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DEFPROV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND ISNULL(PAYMENT_STATUS_VALUE,'') NOT IN ('RECV','CLOS') AND ISNULL(ASSETS_WITH_PROVIDER_VALUE,'') <> 'BENE' ),0) DEFCOUNT FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PERSONACC WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP DEFCOMP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PERSONACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=DEFCOMP.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND ISNULL(DEF_COMP_MONTH_LETTER_FLAG,'')= 'Y' AND ISNULL(DEF_COMP_YEARLY_LETTER_FLAG,'')<> 'Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PERSONACC.PERSON_ID AND DATEDIFF(MONTH,DATE_OF_BIRTH,@BATCHENDDATE) >= 878) AS MAINTAB INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PERSON_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ID AND SP.DATE_OF_DEATH IS NULL INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND SPA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'WTN2'AND SPA.PLAN_ID = 19 INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_DEFERRED_COMP SPADC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPADC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=MAINTAB.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE MAINTAB.DEFCOUNT > 0

select * from sgt_death_notification a WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgt_person b on a.person_id = b.person_id where (exists (select 1 from sgt_person_beneficiary where a.person_id = beneficiary_person_id) or exists(select 1 from sgt_person_dependent where a.person_id = dependent_perslink_id)) and isnull(non_employee_death_batch_flag,'N') = 'N' and action_status_value not in ('ERRN','CANC')

SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT APPACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON APPACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(APPACC.IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'Y')='Y' WHERE PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA','RFND') AND APPACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=@PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID

DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME SELECT @PAYMENTDATE = max(PAYMENT_DATE) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' AND SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' set @PAYMENTDATE = Dateadd(m,1,@PAYMENTDATE)
SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN DBO.SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.STATUS_ID= CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION DEATHNOT WITH(NOLOCK) ON DEATHNOT.PERSON_ID=PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=APP.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID WHERE PAY.ACCOUNT_OWNER_BATCH_INITIATED_FLAG IS NULL AND convert(dateTime,convert(char,DEATHNOT.CREATED_DATE,103),103) <= @BATCHDATE AND PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA') AND DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND CV.DATA2 NOT IN ('CNLP','CNLD') AND DEATHNOT.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'CANC' AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC ) AND PLN.PLAN_ID NOT IN (21,23,24,25) and PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE >=(CASE CV.DATA2 WHEN 'TRMD' THEN PER.DATE_OF_DEATH ELSE PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE END) ORDER BY PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID

DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME SELECT @PAYMENTDATE = max(PAYMENT_DATE) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' AND SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' set @PAYMENTDATE = Dateadd(m,1,@PAYMENTDATE)
SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN DBO.SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN DBO.SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.STATUS_ID= CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION DEATHNOT WITH(NOLOCK) ON DEATHNOT.PERSON_ID=PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY DROBEN WITH (NOLOCK) ON ISNULL(DROBEN.DRO_APPLICATION_ID,0)=APP.DRO_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID=DROBEN.BENEFICIARY_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=APP.PLAN_ID WHERE PAY.ALTERNATE_PAYEE_BATCH_INITIATED_FLAG IS NULL AND convert(dateTime,convert(char,DEATHNOT.CREATED_DATE,103),103) <= @BATCHDATE AND DEATHNOT.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN DROBEN.START_DATE AND ISNULL(DROBEN.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') AND PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR','DISA') AND PAY.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NOT NULL AND CV.DATA2 NOT IN ('CNLP','CNLD') AND DEATHNOT.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'CANC' AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC ) AND PLN.PLAN_ID NOT IN (21,23,24,25) and PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE >=(CASE CV.DATA2 WHEN 'TRMD' THEN PER.DATE_OF_DEATH ELSE PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE END) AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' ORDER BY PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID

DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME SELECT @PAYMENTDATE = max(PAYMENT_DATE) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' AND SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' set @PAYMENTDATE = Dateadd(m,1,@PAYMENTDATE)
SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_BENEFICIARY BEN WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_BENEFICIARY BENACC(NOLOCK) on BEN.BENEFICIARY_ID=BENACC.BENEFICIARY_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PAY WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = BEN.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION DEATHNOT WITH(NOLOCK) ON BEN.PERSON_ID=DEATHNOT.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN DBO.SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN DBO.SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.STATUS_ID= CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAY.APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND BENACC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID=APP.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON PER.PERSON_ID=BEN.BENEFICIARY_PERSON_ID AND PER.DATE_OF_DEATH IS NULL WHERE PAY.FIRST_BENEFICIARY_BATCH_INITIATED_FLAG IS NULL AND convert(dateTime,convert(char,DEATHNOT.CREATED_DATE,103),103) <= @BATCHDATE AND DEATHNOT.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN BENACC.START_DATE AND ISNULL(BENACC.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') AND PAY.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('DETH','PSTD') AND PAY.DRO_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL AND CV.DATA2 NOT IN ('CNLP','CNLD') AND DEATHNOT.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'CANC' AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAY.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC ) AND PLN.PLAN_ID NOT IN (21,23,24,25) and PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE >=(CASE CV.DATA2 WHEN 'TRMD' THEN DEATHNOT.DATE_OF_DEATH ELSE PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE END) and ISNULL(BENACC.DRO_APPLICATION_ID,0) =0 AND BENEFICIARY_TYPE_VALUE='PRIM' ORDER BY PAY.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID

select distinct(destination_benefit_option_value), cod.description from dbo.SGT_POST_RETIREMENT_DEATH_BENEFIT_OPTION_REF ref WITH(NOLOCK) inner join sgs_code_value cod WITH(NOLOCK) on cod.code_id = ref.destination_benefit_option_id and cod.code_value = ref.destination_benefit_option_value where post_retirement_death_reason_type_value = 'ACOD' and benefit_provision_id = 7

SELECT SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID AS [PERSLinkID], ISNULL(SP.LAST_NAME,'')+','+ISNULL(SP.FIRST_NAME,'') AS [LastName], SP.FIRST_NAME AS [FirstName], SPARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE AS [EffectiveDate], SPARC.SALARY_AMOUNT AS [SalaryAmount] FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION SBC ON SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBC.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_REFUND_CALCULATION SBRC ON SBC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID = SBRC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID AND SBA.PLAN_ID = SPA.PLAN_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT_CONTRIBUTION SPARC ON SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPARC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT SPE ON SBA.MEMBER_PERSON_ID = SPE.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO ON SPE.ORG_ID = SO.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.APPLICATION_ID = SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER PHH ON PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DB_TFFR_TRANSFER BATFFR ON BATFFR.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE (((SPA.START_DATE >= SPE.START_DATE AND SPA.START_DATE <= ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,SPA.START_DATE)) AND (ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,SPE.START_DATE) >= SPE.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,GETDATE())) <= ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,GETDATE()))) OR ((SPE.START_DATE >= SPA.START_DATE AND SPE.START_DATE <= ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,SPE.START_DATE)) AND (ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,SPA.START_DATE) >= SPA.START_DATE AND ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,GETDATE())) <= ISNULL(SPA.END_DATE,GETDATE())))) AND (SPARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE >= SPE.START_DATE AND SPARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= ISNULL(SPE.END_DATE,SPARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE)) AND SBA.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE IN ('DBDC','DBTT') AND SBA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RFND' AND PHH.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @PAYMENTSCHEDULEID AND ISNULL(PA.RHIC_EE_AMOUNT_REFUND_FLAG,'N') = 'N' AND SPARC.TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN BATFFR.START_DATE AND BATFFR.END_DATE ORDER BY SP.LAST_NAME,SP.FIRST_NAME,SPARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE,SPARC.SALARY_AMOUNT

SET NOCOUNT ON Declare @CVSC int Set @CVSC=0 declare @NRDTable as Table ( Month int, year int, AgePSC decimal(13,6), ActualPSC decimal(13,6), CumTotal decimal(13,6) )
WHILE @FromDate <= @Todate BEGIN Insert into @NRDTable(Month,year,AgePSC,ActualPSC) Select Month(@FromDate),YEAR(@FromDate),1,ISNULL((Select Sum(VESTED_SERVICE_CREDIT) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT_CONTRIBUTION RET WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACC WITH(NOLOCK) ON RET.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=ACC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PERSON_ID=@PERSONID AND (PLAN_ID=@PLANID OR PLAN_ID IN(SELECT PLAN_ID FROM SGT_PLAN SUB WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PLAN_ID IN (1,2,20,4,5,26,27,3,29) AND 1=(CASE WHEN @PLANID=6 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END))) AND (CASE WHEN PAY_PERIOD_MONTH IS NULL THEN MONTH(EFFECTIVE_DATE) ELSE PAY_PERIOD_MONTH END = MONTH(@FromDate)) AND (CASE WHEN PAY_PERIOD_YEAR IS NULL THEN YEAR(EFFECTIVE_DATE) ELSE PAY_PERIOD_YEAR END = YEAR(@FromDate))),0)
Set @FromDate=dateadd(m,1,@FromDate) END
Update @NRDTable set @CVSC=@CVSC + ActualPSC + AgePSC,CumTotal=@CVSC Select * from @NRDTable WITH(NOLOCK)

DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME SELECT @PAYMENTDATE = max(PAYMENT_DATE) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' AND SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' set @PAYMENTDATE = Dateadd(m,1,@PAYMENTDATE)
SELECT * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT BENACT INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP ON BENACT.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID AND ISNULL(BENACT.IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') = 'Y' INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA ON PA.APPLICATION_ID = APP.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON PAS.STATUS_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE CV.DATA2 <> 'TRMD' AND PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC ) AND PA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE <> 'DISA' AND BENACT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=@PERSONACCOUNTID

select * from sgt_benefit_application where member_person_id=@member_person_id and recipient_person_id=@recipient_person_id and benefit_account_type_value=@benefit_account_type_value and plan_id=@plan_id and received_date is not null

SELECT * FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON B ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID WHERE ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID AND P.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR') WHERE PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL1','SUS2')) -- PROD PIR ID 6576 We need to pick it up if on the date of death an insurance plan was enrolled. OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY(NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') ) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LIFE_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EAP_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION (NOLOCK) LTC ON LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_ID = LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) )
AND ISNULL(EMPLOYEE_DEATH_BATCH_LETTER_SENT,'N') = 'N' AND ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC')
AND (EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.STATUS_ID= CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID WHERE A.PERSON_ID = PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID AND CV.data2 in ('CNLD','TRMD','CLDS', 'RPCD') AND PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE >= P.DATE_OF_DEATH AND PA.BENEFIT_END_DATE < P.DATE_OF_DEATH AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID --and ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC --,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC )) or not exists (select 1 from sgt_payee_account pa where a.person_id = pa.payee_perslink_id))
ORDER BY A.PERSON_ID

SELECT BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION BA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT BAPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = BAPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE BAPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSONACCOUNTID AND BA.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'CANC' AND ISNULL(BAPA.IS_APPLICATION_PERSON_ACCOUNT_FLAG,'N') = 'Y'
SELECT 1 AS DETAIL_EXISTS FROM SGT_EMPLOYER_PAYROLL_DETAIL D WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE D.SSN = @SSN AND D.PLAN_ID = @PLANID AND D.STATUS_VALUE IN ('REVW', 'VALD')

SELECT PED.END_DATE FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PAED WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGT_PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DETAIL PED WITH(NOLOCK) ON PED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID = PAED.PERSON_EMPLOYMENT_DTL_ID WHERE PAED.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSONACCOUNTID AND PAED.PLAN_ID = @PLANID AND PED.STATUS_VALUE = 'CONT' ORDER BY PED.END_DATE DESC

SELECT SUM(ISNULL(PARC.PENSION_SERVICE_CREDIT,0)) as PENSION_SERVICE_CREDIT FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_RETIREMENT_CONTRIBUTION PARC WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PARC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSONACCOUNTID AND PARC.SUBSYSTEM_VALUE IN ('PAYR', 'ADJS', 'ACTR') AND ( (YEAR(PARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE) = YEAR(@TERMINATIONDATE) AND MONTH(PARC.EFFECTIVE_DATE) = MONTH(@TERMINATIONDATE)) OR (ISNULL(PARC.PAY_PERIOD_YEAR, 0) = YEAR(@TERMINATIONDATE) AND ISNULL(PARC.PAY_PERIOD_MONTH, 0) = MONTH(@TERMINATIONDATE)) )

SELECT * FROM SGT_DEATH_NOTIFICATION A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON B ON A.PERSON_ID = B.PERSON_ID WHERE A.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P WITH(NOLOCK) ON PA.PLAN_ID = P.PLAN_ID AND P.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RETR') WHERE PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND PA.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL1','SUS2')) -- PROD PIR ID 6576 We need to pick it up if on the date of death an insurance plan was enrolled. OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV GHDV(NOLOCK) ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_HISTORY(NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID = GHDV.PERSON_ACCOUNT_GHDV_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999') ) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LIFE_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_EAP_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION (NOLOCK) LTC ON LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_HISTORY (NOLOCK) HIS ON HIS.PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_ID = LTC.PERSON_ACCOUNT_LTC_OPTION_ID AND HIS.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE = 'ENL2' AND PA.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID AND A.DATE_OF_DEATH BETWEEN HIS.START_DATE AND ISNULL(HIS.END_DATE,'12/31/9999')) )
AND ISNULL(EMPLOYEE_DEATH_BATCH_LETTER_SENT,'N') = 'N' AND ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('ERRN','CANC')
AND (EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PAS.STATUS_ID= CV.CODE_ID AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID WHERE A.PERSON_ID = PA.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID AND CV.data2 in ('CNLD','TRMD','CLDS', 'RPCD') AND PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE >= P.DATE_OF_DEATH AND PA.BENEFIT_END_DATE < P.DATE_OF_DEATH AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID --and ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC --,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC )) or not exists (select 1 from sgt_payee_account pa where a.person_id = pa.payee_perslink_id))
ORDER BY A.PERSON_ID
